wikipedia_page.main: Andrew McAtee (2 July 1888 – 15 July 1956) was a Scottish footballer who played for Celtic, New Bedford Whalers, Newark Skeeters and Scotland. He played a total of 461 matches for Celtic, winning 10 major trophies.

response: *Andrew McAtee (1888–1956), Scottish footballer (Celtic, New Bedford and Scotland)
